description: Urakawa Yuki is a high-school girl and a C-Genomer who goes the same school as Yuuhi and Aya. Yuki is quiet and has a weak constitution. She can`t transform into a tennyo, but she can manifest the power of pyrokinesis. She has a relationship with her teacher, who is actually an agent sent by Mikage International to capture Aya (Ceres). In the end, Urakawa burned the agent and hugged him, which causes her to get severely burnt and die.
name: Urakawa Yuki
